version_description:
Thank you for playing The Elder Scrolls: Blades Early Access!

Here's what's new in the latest update:
- Fixed the issue where some store regions were showing items as no-cost.
- Players with special characters in their usernames should be able to log in without issue.
- Miscellaneous bug and crash fixes.
- Please note: this update is large and may require a WiFi connection to update. Future update sizes should be smaller.

What’s new in this version:

• Bethesda.net account is no longer needed to play.
• New daily reward notification.
• Added new collection Job types.
• Daily and weekly Jobs now reward Gems.
• Miscellaneous bug fixes and balance adjustments.

• Increased Gem rewards for daily and weekly Jobs!
• Fixed several login issues and other miscellaneous bugs.

Here's what's new in the latest update:

• New enemies: Flame, Frost, and Storm Atronachs
• New challenges with Gem rewards
• Improved arena job opponents
• A Hide Helmet option
• Lip sync for voiced NPCs
• Enemy weakness icons displayed during combat
• And lots more!

Here's what's new in the latest update:

• NEW Questline: Through intrigue and murder, a dark menace threatens the kingdom
• NEW Questline: Search for a fabled Dwemer artifact with Gabrielle the conjurer
• NEW Quest: Can you reach the top of the wizard’s tower?
• Miscellaneous fixes and improvements

• Fixed several rare issues where players could get stuck on the initial loading screen
• Fixed an issue where the gold/xp multiplier would not update on screen in the Abyss

It’s the Witches Festival and the Elders have prepared all manner of frightening treats for you.

· 4 New frightening Quests that will make your blood curdle!
· It’s the dead of night in Town to celebrate the Witches Festival
· Spectacularly spooky new decorations to earn, craft, and buy
· Spell Overhaul: Spells deal more damage and can’t be interrupted anymore

The Witches’ Festival has ended & The Elders are hard at work on some great things.
Stay tuned for the next update.

It’s time for the New Life Festival, and with new life comes the biggest Blades update ever!

•No more Chest Timers!
•Fight other players in the new Arena mode
•Join a Guild, trade materials, and visit other Towns
•Collect tons more loot from objects and enemies
•Get the best loot from every job’s new Boss
•It’s a snowy wonderland in Town to celebrate the New Life Festival
•Smash opponents with powered up Abilities

•Crash and performance fixes in the Arena
•Removed permanent exclamation markers on the Main Menu
•Ebony Mail and Rimelink Artifacts no longer make players undefeatable in the Arena
•Other miscellaneous bug fixes
